类 Percolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Percolation

  • public class Percolation
extends java.lang.Object

    this program is to estimate the value of the percolation threshold

    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    YuanBo

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Percolation(int N)
      create N-by-N grid, with all sites blocked
